column3:
What is the operator that allows a function to receive any number of arguments so then the function can consume them from an array? Write the name of the operator in the line 1 and in the line 2 an example of an arrow function getParams that will use the [?] operator to then be able to use the array params, in this case to print the array to the console.
...
...
getParams(1,2, "three");
column5: *Remember that for normal functions, there is the arguments keyword that returns an array like list, but it does not exist for arrow functions.
